# wpgen : 数据生成工具



```
generate data to wpflow

Usage: wpgen <COMMAND>

Commands:
  rule    use rule generate data ,send to wpflow 
  sample  use sample generate data ,send to wpflow 
  conf    conf cmd
  data    data cmd
  help    Print this message or the help of the given subcommand(s)

Options:
  -h, --help  Print help
```



```
Usage: wpgen conf <COMMAND>

Commands:
  check  check config file
  init   init config file
  clean  clean config file
  help   Print this message or the help of the given subcommand(s)

Options:
  -h, --help  Print help
```
